author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
While the left denies that biological reality is a thing and slanders those who dare to disagree with them, they have destroyed women’s sports all under the guise of inclusivity, and that is something that will never be moral.

A mom spoke up at the Naperville school board meeting after her daughter was forced to compete against a male athlete, who would likely have failed had he participated on the male team.

“I’m here to protect my daughter because she matters too!” This mother came to speak for her daughter, who was devastated when she had to compete against a boy pretending to be a girl at a 7th grade track meet in Naperville, Illinois.
title: "My daughter matters too": Mother shuts down woke school forcing (trans) boys into girls' sports
